item.title: Reviewer’s Guide for Remote 3D Graphics Apps
item.description: 有了这3本书我们再也不用担心GPU的测试了。 [su_button url=“http://www.citrix.com/wsdm/restServe/skb/attachments/RDY12010/Reviewer%27s%20Guide%20for%20HDX%203D%20Pro%20-%2001%20XenServer.pdf” target=“blank” style=“3d” background="#4e7f22" size=“6” icon=“icon: download”]Part 1下载点击这里 Reviewer’s Guide for Remote 3D Graphics Apps [/su_button] [su_button url=“http://www.citrix.com/wsdm/restServe/skb/attachments/RDY12011/Reviewer%27s%20Guide%20for%20HDX%203D%20Pro%20-%2002%20vDGA.pdf” target=“blank” style=“3d” background="#4e7f22" size=“6” icon=“icon: download”]Part 2 下载点击这里 Reviewer’s Guide for Remote 3D Graphics Apps [/su_button] [su_button url=“http://www.citrix.com/wsdm/restServe/skb/attachments/RDY12202/Reviewer%20Guide%20for%20HDX%203D%20Pro%2003%20vGPU%20GA.pdf” target=“blank” style=“3d” background="#4e7f22" size=“6” icon=“icon: download”]Part3 下载点击这里 Reviewer’s Guide for Remote 3D Graphics Apps [/su_button] This document helps you set up a simplified lab to review hardware-accelerated GPU virtualization for Windows desktop VDI workloads on Citrix XenServer.
